title: STAT+: BridgeBio drug for genetic cause of dwarfism succeeds in key study
description: BridgeBio Pharma’s experimental drug for the most common cause of dwarfism accelerated children’s growth in a pivotal clinical trial.
content: BridgeBio Pharma’s experimental drug for the most common cause of dwarfism accelerated children’s growth in a pivotal clinical trial.
